overview:
Christophe’s strength is to reinvent traditional businesses, bring in new perspectives and execute through innovative system, people and technology solutions.

Christophe spent over 13 years in Asia; he participated in major business development projects in Thailand, singapore and Hong Kong and succeeded in creating financial value from capitalizing unexplored opportunities.

Christophe vision is to deliver with BOOSST a free online global platform to assist everyone and anyone to understand, manage and plan their personal and financial life easily. Christophe believe is that everyone have a dream and goals all they need is support to achieve their goals step by step!
